text: Tajikistan First League (Tajiki: Лигаи якуми Тоҷикистон / Ligai yakumi Tojikiston; Russian: Первая лига Таджикистана) — football league in Tajikistan, the second level of importance after the Tajikistan Higher League. It is operated under the auspices of the Tajikistan Football League Organization and rebranded Tajikistan Football Federation. The Tajikistan First League was founded in 2004. According to previous reports, Tajikistan's First League was founded in 1992, as well as many "First Leagues" of other Post-Soviet countries.rsssf.com - Tajikistan == Format == 12 clubs participate in the Tajikistan First League. The winner of the Tajikistan First League receives a ticket to the Tajikistan Higher League (The winner of the First League is allowed to participate in the Higher League after obtaining a license and fulfilling certain obligations. Otherwise the club remains in the First League), and the club who took second place will play play off matches with the club who took seventh place in the Tajikistan Higher League. The winner of the playoffs is eligible to participate in the Higher League, and the losing club will start the next season in the First League. Clubs who have taken the last place in the First League are not always relegated from the First League. It depends on the capabilities (Finance, License) of the club next season.fft.tj: ИСПОЛКОМ ФФТ ПОДВЕЛ ИТОГИ ГОДА И ОПРЕДЕЛИЛ КОНТУРЫ НОВОГО СЕЗОНА Usually the clubs that took the last place in the First League is relegated to the Tajikistan Second League. Their place is taken by the best team from the Tajikistan Second League. == Winners == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season !! title: Tajikistan First League
